name: Pizza Time (BeazleBee)
description:
Game Summary:

A VR time management game where players run a pizzeria.

Core Mechanics:

  • Oculus Rift and HTC Vive controllers to grab ingredients.
  • Stack ingredients to accommodate customer requests.
  • Cook pizzas in the oven, but be careful to avoid burning the pizza.
  • Serve customers cooked pizzas with the correct toppings. 
  • Flatten out your dough by throwing it up in the air.
